title: 2008 Anime Logo
author: akovia

comments.content: Looks like [Times](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317065018/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/times) Bold Italic awfully squooshed to me.

Omg I can't believe there's a font for the anime series Crystal Blaze!  
 [Watch Anime Online](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317065018/http:/www.lovelyanime.com/)
